alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Geauga; Portage; Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 2:44PM EDT until July 25 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Portage County in northeastern Ohio... Southwestern Geauga County in northeastern Ohio... East central Cuyahoga County in northeastern Ohio... Northeastern Summit County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 243 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Chagrin Falls, or 14 miles southwest of Chardon, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Solon, Twinsburg, Streetsboro, Macedonia, South Russell, Mantua, Aurora, Chagrin Falls, Reminderville, Orange, Moreland Hills, Glenwillow, Bentleyville and Bainbridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
